alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 05 at 10:22PM CST until March 08 at 8:19PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, the Happy Hollow Picnic Area floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 3.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1030 AM CST.
